parameters.name: DestColumns
parameters.description: Target data table mapping field list.

parameters.name: ErrorLimitCount
parameters.description: When data in Kafka does not match the ADBPG target table, it will cause a write failure. This value is the number of error rows allowed; exceeding this will cause the task to fail.

parameters.name: FallbackOffset
parameters.description:
FallbackOffset, fallback offset

- The FallbackOffset parameter defines the behavior when the consumer does not request a specific offset or the requested offset exceeds the current Kafka cluster's recorded offset information. You can choose to start consuming from the earliest (newest) or latest (oldest) offset.

parameters.name: JobConfig
parameters.description: Job configuration file, required for professional mode.

parameters.name: MatchColumns
parameters.description: Match columns, usually all primary key columns of the target table. If all column values in this configuration are the same, the two rows of data are considered duplicates.

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description:
Configuration mode
1. Basic mode requires specifying some configuration fields
1. Professional mode supports submitting a YAML file

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
Region ID.

> You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) API to view available region IDs.

parameters.name: TryRun
parameters.description:
Whether to test the real-time task, values:

- true

- false

Default value: false.

parameters.name: UpdateColumns
parameters.description: Update columns, usually all non-primary key columns of the target table. When data is determined to be duplicate through MatchColumns, updating the UpdateColumns column values will result in new data overwriting old data.
